title: A Sad Day at the Beach: Two People Die in Cold Water
summary: Two people died after a big search and rescue operation at the beach in Withernsea, a town on the east coast of England. It happened on Friday when some people got into trouble in the water. Police say one person is still missing, and they are looking for them. The weather was very cold and snowy, making it hard for rescuers like the coastguard and lifeboat crews to search. A church opened for people to pray and get support. This is a tragic event that has made the town very sad.
